Class Jabber::Bytestreams::IqQueryBytestreams
In: lib/xmpp4r/bytestreams/iq/bytestreams.rb
Parent: IqQuery

Class for accessing <query/> elements with xmlns=‘jabber.org/protocol/bytestreams’ in <iq/> stanzas.

Methods

51:       def mode=(m)
